body_html:
Thanks for the quick reply.
What I understood is that variables_to_restore is used when tf.train.ExponentialMovingAverage exists in the model. Am I right? If so, I think I cannot use it, since I do not have tf.train.ExponentialMovingAverage in my model.
body_text:
Thanks for the quick reply.
What I understood is that variables_to_restore is used when tf.train.ExponentialMovingAverage exists in the model. Am I right? If so, I think I cannot use it, since I do not have tf.train.ExponentialMovingAverage in my model.
body:
Thanks for the quick reply. 
What I understood is that `variables_to_restore` is used when `tf.train.ExponentialMovingAverage` exists in the model. Am I right? If so, I think I cannot use it, since I do not have `tf.train.ExponentialMovingAverage` in my model.
